title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, June 4, 1921. A Complete Report of the Ceska Dobrocinna Spolecnost V Chicagu on Collection Undertaken May 30, 1921

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, June 4, 1921. A COMPLETE REPORT OF THE CESKA DOBROCINNA SPOLECNOST V CHICAGU ON COLLECTION UNDERTAKEN MAY 30, 1921

body.p: [The names and addresses of the ladies who took part in the collection and the amount collected by each are omitted in translation.]

The total amount collected was $1,872.62. The Ceska Dobrocinna Spolecnost hereby thanks everyone of the self-sacrificing ladies who during the entire day exerted their best efforts and worked for the benefit of a good cause.
